VerticalLayout.Text:
Welcome to Star Wars: Legion for TTS, v5.0.0-beta.
This is a beta release, and is not suitable for tournament play.
To access the stable version of the mod visit https://go.swlegion.dev/mod.
CHANGELOG
(Since last Beta)
- FIX: Order tokens now only activate the right unit ranks. - FIX: Using "Assign" on a Blank Token after "Promote" create the right token.
(Since last Stable)
- NEW: Added a new welcome dialog and UI alternative to the janky notecards. - NEW: Added A-A5 Speeder Truck, LAAT, and associated upgrades. - FIX: Armies no longer spawn off the table in some scenarios. - FIX: Multi-faction units now spawn the correct version. - FIX: Upgrades with double quotes no longer crash the list builder(s). - FIX: Anakin can now equip dark-side upgrades. - FIX: Imperial Saboteur's are no longer the leader in full-size squads. - FIX: The "blank" order token now functions properly (assign/promote/covert).

Unit Sizes:
